sec.title: Acknowledgements
sec.p: Dr. Bo Lilliehöök is greatly acknowledged for interesting discussions and valuable contributions. This study was supported by the Swedish Defence Agency, the Medical Faculty of Umeå University and grants from the County Council of Västerbotten. This project was also partially supported by grants from the Swedish Research Council (project 12177) and the European Community (contract no. QLK2-CT-2002-01358).
